00024 void AloneModeAi::Process(Player* player)
00025 {
00026     /*
00027      IA Process Alone :
00028      ------------------
00029 
00030      Rechrche une collision avec la map : isCollidWithMap
00031 
00032      Rechrche un item nécéssaire : m_targetItem
00033 
00034      Si m_targetItem
00035      {
00036         Si isCollidWithMap
00037             Mouvement vers m_targetItem.pos
00038      }
00039 
00040      Sinon
00041      {
00042         Si userPlayer.pos - playerPos < m_minDistToShoot
00043             Tire sur m_targetPos
00044 
00045         Si isCollidWithMap
00046             Mouvement vers m_strikePos
00047 
00048         Si AI_SWITCH_WEAPON_TIME
00049             Changement d'arme
00050      }
00051      */
00052 
00053     if(!m_targetPlayer)
00054         m_targetPlayer = m_playManager->GetUserPlayer();
00055 
00056     Vector3f addForce;
00057     Vector3f playerPos = player->GetPos();
00058 
00059     // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 
00061     //    StaticObject::Array& staticObjects = m_playManager->map.staticObjects;
00062     //
00063     //    bool isCollidWithMap = false;
00064     //
00065     //    for(unsigned i = 0; i < staticObjects.size(); i++)
00066     //        if(isCollidWithMap = player->GetPhysicBody()->IsCollidWith(staticObjects[i]->GetPhysicBody()))
00067     //            break;
00068 
00069     // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 
00071     m_targetPos = m_targetPlayer->GetPos();
00072 
00073     if(m_switchTarget.IsEsplanedTime(m_aiParams.switchTargetTime)
00074        || m_strikePos - playerPos < m_minDistToSwith)
00075     {
00076         do
00077             m_strikePos = tools::rand(m_targetPos - m_strikPrimiter, m_targetPos + m_strikPrimiter);
00078         while(!m_mapAABB.IsInner(m_strikePos));
00079 
00080         m_strikePos.y = 0;
00081     }
00082 
00083     if(m_targetPos - playerPos < m_minDistToShoot)
00084     {
00085         Vector3f targetPos = m_targetPos;
00086 
00087         if(m_targetPlayer == m_playManager->GetUserPlayer()
00088            && m_playManager->GetBullettime()->IsActive())
00089         {
00090             Vector3f velocity;
00091             NewtonBodyGetVelocity(m_targetPlayer->GetPhysicBody()->GetBody(), velocity);
00092 
00093             targetPos = m_targetPos - velocity;
00094         }
00095 
00096         if(m_gustCount < m_aiParams.shootGustCount)
00097         {
00098             Vector3f margin = tools::rand(AABB(m_aiParams.shootAccuracy));
00099             if(player->Shoot(m_targetPos + margin))
00100                 m_gustCount++;
00101         }
00102         else if(m_gustClock.IsEsplanedTime(m_aiParams.shootGustTime))
00103             m_gustCount = 0;
00104     }
00105 
00106     if((AABB(-1, 1) + m_lastPos).IsInner(player)
00107        && m_lastPosClock.IsEsplanedTime(2000))
00108     {
00109         do
00110         {
00111             m_strikePos = tools::rand(m_playManager->map.aabb);
00112             m_strikePos.y = 1;
00113             m_strikePos = m_playManager->parallelscene.newton->FindFloor(m_strikePos);
00114         }
00115         while(m_strikePos.y < m_playManager->map.aabb.min.y);
00116 
00117         addForce = m_strikePos;
00118     }
00119     else
00120         m_lastPos = playerPos;
00121 
00122     if(player->GetCurWeapon()->IsEmpty())
00123         player->SwitchUpWeapon();
00124 
00125     addForce = m_strikePos;
00126     addForce = (addForce - playerPos).Normalize() * m_worldSettings.playerMoveSpeed;
00127     addForce.y = 0;
00128 
00129     player->GetPhysicBody()->SetApplyForce(addForce);
00130 }
